international_customers.name: International Customer Data
international_customers.description: Configuration for processing international customer databases

fields.Company Name: Official name of the company or business entity
fields.Country: Country name, ISO code, or country abbreviation
fields.Region: State, province, region, or administrative division
fields.Postal Code: ZIP code, postal code, or similar location identifier
fields.Street Address: Complete street address including number and street name
fields.VAT Number: VAT registration number, tax ID, or fiscal identifier
fields.Industry: Business sector, industry type, or classification

ecommerce_orders.name: E-commerce Order Data
ecommerce_orders.description: Configuration for processing online store order information

fields.Order ID: Unique order identifier or order number
fields.Customer Name: Customer full name or business name
fields.Product Name: Name or title of the ordered product
fields.SKU: Stock keeping unit, product code, or item number
fields.Order Date: Date when the order was placed

employee_records.name: Employee Records
employee_records.description: Configuration for HR and employee management systems

fields.Employee ID: Unique employee identifier or badge number
fields.Start Date: Employment start date or hire date
fields.Salary: Annual salary, wage, or compensation amount
fields.Location: Office location, branch, or work site

financial_transactions.name: Financial Transactions
financial_transactions.description: Configuration for accounting and financial data processing

fields.Transaction ID: Unique transaction identifier or reference number
fields.Counterparty: Other party involved in the transaction
fields.Reference: External reference number or invoice number

inventory_management.name: Inventory Management
inventory_management.description: Configuration for warehouse and inventory systems

fields.Item Code: Product SKU, item number, or inventory code
fields.Location: Warehouse location, shelf, or bin number
fields.Status: Item status (active, discontinued, out of stock)
